promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple rabbit fighting-type pokemon holding a stone lance. It can be found in ruins-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lancehare, a a young simple rabbit fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in ruins-like environments It has the following abilities: Needle Ball. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "fighting" or "Lancehare". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, rabbit-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This agile creature, known as Lancehare, thrives in ancient debris. They use the Needle Ball to fend off threats, training daily in solitude.
